blocks.name: crngo
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all unital rings.
blocks.origin: const class crngo { RingOps }

blocks.name: diff.crngo.s
diff.crngo.c
diff.crngo.w
df-rngo
blocks.content: Define the class of all unital rings. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-rngo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(crngo, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cablo), wf(cv(s1), cxp(crn(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))), crn(cv(s0)))), wa(wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cv(s4)), co(cv(s2), cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s4)))), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))), co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s4)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cv(s4)), co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s4)), cv(s0), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s4)))))))), wrex(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s3)), wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: relrngo
blocks.content: The class of all unital rings is a relation. (Contributed by FL, 31-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm relrngo() {
  |- wrel(crngo)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, hs1, crngo, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cablo), wf(cv(hs1), cxp(crn(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0))), crn(cv(hs0)))), wa(wral(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(hs4, crn(cv(hs0)), w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs3), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)))), wceq(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs3), cv(hs0), cv(hs4))), co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs3), cv(hs1), cv(hs4)))))))), wrex(hs2, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, crn(cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), cv(hs3)), wceq(co(cv(hs3), cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs3))))))))
  df-rngo(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relrngo() {
  ⊢ Rel(RingOps)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, hs1, crngo, ((hs0 ∈ AbelOp ∧(hs1 :(ran(hs0)× ran(hs0))→ ran(hs0)))∧(∀(hs2 ∈ ran(hs0), ∀(hs3 ∈ ran(hs0), ∀(hs4 ∈ ran(hs0),(((hs2[hs1]hs3)[hs1]hs4)=(hs2[hs1](hs3[hs1]hs4))∧(hs2[hs1](hs3[hs0]hs4))=((hs2[hs1]hs3)[hs0](hs2[hs1]hs4))∧((hs2[hs0]hs3)[hs1]hs4)=((hs2[hs1]hs4)[hs0](hs3[hs1]hs4))))))∧ ∃(hs2 ∈ ran(hs0), ∀(hs3 ∈ ran(hs0),((hs2[hs1]hs3)= hs3 ∧(hs3[hs1]hs2)= hs3))))))
  df-rngo(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
}

blocks.name: isrngo
blocks.content: The predicate "is a (unital) ring." Definition of ring with unit in [Schechter] p. 187. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Nov-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: isrngod
blocks.content: Conditions that determine a ring. (Changed label from ~ isringd to ~ isrngod -NM 2-Aug-2013.) (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isrngod(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), crngo))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cablo))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, crn(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c0, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), c0, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(c3, c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, c3), cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cablo), wf(c1, cxp(crn(c0), crn(c0)), crn(c0))), wa(wral(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wral(s2, crn(c0), w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c0, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), c0, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, crn(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))

blocks.name: rngoi

thm rngoi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  sylib(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cop(c1, c2), crngo))
  eqeltrd(cop(c1, c2), crngo, c0, wcel(c0, crngo))
  syl6reqr(cop(c1, c2), c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wcel(c0, crngo))
  mpan(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(crngo))
  relrngo()
  1st2nd(crngo, c0)
  opeq12i(c1, c2, cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  id(wcel(c0, crngo))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(c1, c2), crngo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cablo), wf(c2, cxp(c3, c3), c3)), wa(wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))), wcel(c2, universe))

blocks.name: rngosm
blocks.content: Functionality of the multiplication operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngosm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c3))
} = {
  simprd(wcel(c0, crngo), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wcel(c3, cablo))
  simpld(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wcel(c3, cablo), wf(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2)), wa(wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, c2, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c1, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), c1, co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), c1, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), c3, co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))))), wrex(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))))
  rngoi(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c3, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rngosm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps →(c1 :(c2 × c2)→ c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c3)
} = {
  simprd(c0 ∈ RingOps, (c1 :(c2 × c2)→ c2), c3 ∈ AbelOp)
  simpld(c0 ∈ RingOps, (c3 ∈ AbelOp ∧(c1 :(c2 × c2)→ c2)), (∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(((hs0[c1]hs1)[c1]hs2)=(hs0[c1](hs1[c1]hs2))∧(hs0[c1](hs1[c3]hs2))=((hs0[c1]hs1)[c3](hs0[c1]hs2))∧((hs0[c3]hs1)[c1]hs2)=((hs0[c1]hs2)[c3](hs1[c1]hs2))))))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,((hs0[c1]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[c1]hs0)= hs1)))))
  rngoi(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c3, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: rngocl
blocks.content: Closure of the multiplication operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngoid
blocks.content: The multiplication operation of a unital ring has (one or more) identity elements. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngoid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c4))

thm rngoid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]c1)= c1 ∧(c1[c3]s0)= c1)))
  ⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]c1)= c1 ∧(c1[c3]s0)= c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[c3]s0)= hs0))))
  syl(c0 ∈ RingOps, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[c3]s0)= hs0))), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[c3]s0)= hs0))))
  simprrd(c0 ∈ RingOps, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[c3]s0)= hs0))), (c4 ∈ AbelOp ∧(c3 :(c2 × c2)→ c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(((s0[c3]hs0)[c3]hs1)=(s0[c3](hs0[c3]hs1))∧(s0[c3](hs0[c4]hs1))=((s0[c3]hs0)[c4](s0[c3]hs1))∧((s0[c4]hs0)[c3]hs1)=((s0[c3]hs1)[c4](hs0[c3]hs1)))))))
  rngoi(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c4, c3, c2)
  r19.12(s0, hs0, c2, c2, ((s0[c3]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[c3]s0)= hs0))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[c3]s0)= hs0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]c1)= c1 ∧(c1[c3]s0)= c1)))
  rexbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c1, ((s0[c3]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[c3]s0)= hs0), ((s0[c3]c1)= c1 ∧(c1[c3]s0)= c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, (s0[c3]hs0)= hs0, (hs0[c3]s0)= hs0, (s0[c3]c1)= c1, (c1[c3]s0)= c1)
  eqeq12d((s0[c3]hs0), hs0, (s0[c3]c1), c1, hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, s0, c3)
  eqeq12d((hs0[c3]s0), hs0, (c1[c3]s0), c1, hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c3, s0)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]c1)= c1 ∧(c1[c3]s0)= c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  mpan9(wcel(c0, crngo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, c2, w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c5, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), c5, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, co(cv(hs1), c6, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c6, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1)), c5, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs2)), c6, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs2)))))))))

blocks.name: rngoablo2
blocks.content: In a unital ring the addition is an abelian group. (Contributed by FL, 31-Aug-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngogrpo
blocks.content: A ring's addition operation is a group operation. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngone0
blocks.content: The base set of a ring is not empty. (Contributed by FL, 24-Jan-2010.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngogcl
blocks.content: Closure law for the addition (group) operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngocom
blocks.content: The addition operation of a ring is commutative. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngoaass
blocks.content: The addition operation of a ring is associative. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngoa32
blocks.content: The addition operation of a ring is commutative. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngoa4
blocks.content: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a sum of ring elements. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngorcan

blocks.name: rngolcan
blocks.content: Left cancellation law for the addition operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngo0cl

blocks.name: rngo0rid
blocks.content: The additive identity of a ring is a right identity element. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngo0lid
blocks.content: The additive identity of a ring is a left identity element. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rngolz

thm rngodm1dm2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps → dom(dom(c1))= dom(dom(c2)))

} = {

  grpofo(c1, ran(c1))
  rngosm(c0, c2, ran(c1), c1)
  eqid(ran(c1))
  syl5com((c1 :(ran(c1)× ran(c1))↠ ran(c1)), (c2 :(ran(c1)× ran(c1))→ ran(c1)), dom(dom(c1))= dom(dom(c2)), dom(c1)=(ran(c1)× ran(c1)))
  fdmd(c1, (ran(c1)× ran(c1)), ran(c1), (c1 :(ran(c1)× ran(c1))↠ ran(c1)))
  fof(c1, (ran(c1)× ran(c1)), ran(c1))
  syl((c2 :(ran(c1)× ran(c1))→ ran(c1)), (dom(c1)=(ran(c1)× ran(c1))→ dom(dom(c1))= dom(dom(c2))), dom(c2)=(ran(c1)× ran(c1)))
  fdm(c2, (ran(c1)× ran(c1)), ran(c1))
  eqcoms(dom(c2), (ran(c1)× ran(c1)), (dom(c1)=(ran(c1)× ran(c1))→ dom(dom(c1))= dom(dom(c2))))
  expcom((ran(c1)× ran(c1))= dom(c2), dom(c1)=(ran(c1)× ran(c1)), dom(dom(c1))= dom(dom(c2)))
  dmeqd(dom(c1), dom(c2), (dom(c1)=(ran(c1)× ran(c1))∧(ran(c1)× ran(c1))= dom(c2)))
  eqtr(dom(c1), (ran(c1)× ran(c1)), dom(c2))

blocks.name: rngoidmlem
blocks.content: The unit of a ring is an identity element for the multiplication. (Contributed by FL, 18-Feb-2010.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm rngoidmlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)))

} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, crngo), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))), wi(wcel(c1, crn(c4)), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1))))

  eqtr(c2, ran((1st ` c0)), ran(c4))
